attributes.action: Ban not just smoking but also the SALES of tobacco altogether (cigars, cigarettes etc.), promise stiff sentences for those who won't comply, and privatise the BBC and Channel Four to make up for the loss of money from tobacco tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ALL scientists agree that smoking is deadly dangerous to active AND passive smokers. Smoking bans for pubs aren't enough, people can smoke at home - and they do. Parents who smoke at home harm their children if they're there. Smokers also inhale deadly polonium, with which Litvinenko was killed. Please impose a tobacco sales ban and work with foreign PMs to sign a GLOBAL tobacco sales ban treaty.
